text: Haldan Keffer Hartline ForMemRS (December 22, 1903 â€“ March 17, 1983) was an American physiologist. He was a co-winner (with George Wald and Ragnar Granit) of the 1967 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine for his work in analyzing the neurophysiological mechanisms of vision. ==Sources== ==Other wbesites== *Nobel biography *National Academy of Sciences Biographical Memoir Category:1903 births Category:1983 deaths Category:American physiologists Category:Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine winners Category:American Nobel Prize winners Category:Scientists from Pennsylvania
title: Haldan Keffer Hartline
